name: promptpro-extension
description: Build tooling for PromptPro Chrome extension.

scripts.copy:static: copyfiles manifest.json popup.html popup.js styles.css icons/**/* dist
scripts.minify:js: terser background.js -o dist/background.js --compress --mangle && terser content.js -o dist/content.js --compress --mangle && terser popup.js -o dist/popup.js --compress --mangle
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run prepare:dist && npm run copy:static && npm run minify:js && npm run minify:css
scripts.build:zip: npm run build && npm run zip
